description: PWGSC, on behalf of Department of National Defence, Correctional Service of Canada and Fisheries and Ocean Canada, is issuing this request for standing offer for the acquisition of Fresh fruits and vegetables located in Quebec, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title

E6MON-24PQFL_P03-OCPR

## Solicitation Number

WS4556634926

## Tender Details

* Publication Date: 2024-07-10
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-15T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2024-07-15
* Expected Contract Start Date: NA
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-06-30

## Tender Status

This tender has been CANCELLED.

## Classification

* 50300000: Fresh Fruits
* 50400000: Fresh Vegetables

## Tender Method

Competitive – Open Bidding

## Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements

This tender is open to contractors who have adopted any of the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Procurement Region

* Quebec (except for the National Capital Region)

## Contracting Entity

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contracting Entity Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Point of Contact

Adjakly, Efoé (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: None
Fax: None

## Tender Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20278457?extsite=MjAyNzg0NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
